title: Swipe up to unlock the screen on Pixel 3 (Android 10) is annoying
content:
To unlock my Pixel 3 XL, I need to swipe up too long from the bottom till the top to unlock the screen currently. Before a month it was just a casual short swipe up.

Anyone facing this issue with Pixel 3 Android 10 recent times? Is there a resolution or a workaround to fix this problem?
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
